title: Power tariff to be increased ?
body_lines: Electricity tariff of those who uses a excessive quantity of units such as factories, hotels, residences and other institutions will have to be increased three fold or four fold
Electricity tariff of those who uses a excessive quantity of units will have to be increased drastically, Minister of Power and Energy Kanchana Wijesekera said yesterday.
Electricity tariff of those who uses a excessive quantity of units such as factories, hotels, residences and other institutions will have to be increased three fold or four fold, the Minister said.
He said a tariff revision has been recommended and those who uses higher number of units will have to shift to alternatives. “ Going for solar panels will be an effective ;alternative,” he added.
